Package com.bookingmx.reservation.util

Class PriceCalculator

java.lang.Object
com.bookingmx.reservation.util.PriceCalculator
public class PriceCalculator extends Object
Utility class for calculating prices in the reservation system. This class handles all price-related calculations including base prices, discounts for extended stays, taxes, and final totals. All methods are static and the class cannot be instantiated. Business Rules: - 7-13 nights: 5% discount - 14-29 nights: 10% discount - 30+ nights: 15% discount - Tax rate: 16% (standard hotel tax)
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
BookingMx Development Team

    • calculateBasePrice

      public static double calculateBasePrice(RoomType roomType, long numberOfNights)
      Calculates the base price for a reservation without any discounts or taxes. Base price = room base price per night Ã— number of nights
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      Returns:
      the base price before discounts and taxes
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if roomType is null or numberOfNights is negative

    • calculateBasePrice

      public static double calculateBasePrice(RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Calculates the base price using check-in and check-out dates.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      the base price before discounts and taxes
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or dates are invalid

    • getDiscountRate

      public static double getDiscountRate(long numberOfNights)
      Determines the applicable discount rate based on the number of nights. Discount tiers: - 1-6 nights: 0% (no discount) - 7-13 nights: 5% discount - 14-29 nights: 10% discount - 30+ nights: 15% discount
      Parameters:
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      Returns:
      the discount rate as a decimal (0.0 to 0.15)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if numberOfNights is negative

    • calculateDiscount

      public static double calculateDiscount(double basePrice, long numberOfNights)
      Calculates the discount amount based on base price and number of nights.
      Parameters:
      basePrice - the base price before discount
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      Returns:
      the discount amount to be subtracted from base price
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if basePrice is negative or numberOfNights is negative

    • calculatePriceAfterDiscount

      public static double calculatePriceAfterDiscount(RoomType roomType, long numberOfNights)
      Calculates the price after applying discount but before tax.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      Returns:
      the price after discount, before tax
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if roomType is null or numberOfNights is negative

    • calculateTax

      public static double calculateTax(double price)
      Calculates the tax amount based on a given price.
      Parameters:
      price - the price on which to calculate tax
      Returns:
      the tax amount
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if price is negative

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public static double calculateTotalPrice(RoomType roomType, long numberOfNights, boolean includeTax)
      Calculates the total price including discount and tax. This is the final price the customer will pay. Formula: (base price - discount) + tax on discounted price
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      includeTax - whether to include tax in the calculation
      Returns:
      the total final price
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if roomType is null or numberOfNights is negative

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public static double calculateTotalPrice(RoomType roomType, long numberOfNights)
      Calculates the total price including discount and tax (convenience method). By default includes tax.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      Returns:
      the total final price including tax
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if roomType is null or numberOfNights is negative

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public static double calculateTotalPrice(RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, boolean includeTax)
      Calculates the total price using check-in and check-out dates.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      includeTax - whether to include tax in the calculation
      Returns:
      the total final price
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or dates are invalid

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public static double calculateTotalPrice(RoomType roomType, LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Calculates the total price using dates, including tax by default.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      the total final price including tax
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or dates are invalid

    • getPriceBreakdown

      public static PriceCalculator.PriceBreakdown getPriceBreakdown(RoomType roomType, long numberOfNights)
      Gets a breakdown of the price calculation showing all components. Useful for displaying itemized pricing to customers.
      Parameters:
      roomType - the type of room being reserved
      numberOfNights - the number of nights for the stay
      Returns:
      a PriceBreakdown object containing all price components
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if roomType is null or numberOfNights is negative

      Parameters:
      price - the price to format
      Returns:
      formatted price string (e.g., "$150.00")
